name: Eclox
tagline: Eclox is a simple doxygen frontend plug-in for eclipse. It aims to provide a slim and sleek integration of the code documentation process into eclipse.
body:
# eclox
Eclox is a simple doxygen frontend plug-in for eclipse. It aims to provide a slim and sleek integration of the code documentation process into eclipse.

Features Overview 
- Graphical edition of doxyfile settings
- integrated doxygen invocation
- doxygen outputs logging and
- optional packaged doxygen binaries (for windows and linux)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
